creator: gael.stevens@oracle.com
text:
As per the 1.1.0-B1 version permittedTaglibs.tld scriptfree.tld  have:
<taglib xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xsi:schemaLocation=
   "http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee web jsptaglibrary_2_0.xsd"
    version="2.0">
The schemaLocation should be:
   "http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee web-jsptaglibrary_2_0.xsd"

creator: pierre.delisle@sun.com
text:
This has been fixed in bug 24863 and will show up in our upcoming release of
standard-1.1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 24863 ***
